reviewText: Disc was not readable had to purchase again
A classic hard core, OG movie.  If you are a fan of Denzel, then you must have this movie in your collection.  Its Denzel at his best!

This dvd is in another language. I tried everything to get it yo play but when Iooked closely I could see that it's in another language and would not play in my dvd player. I'm requesting a return label and a complete refund. I've already purchased this at Walmart for $3.74
